content: note this pattern is available for free in my free pattern library as a perk to newsletter subscribers this is accessible with a link that is provided in the welcome email sign up here 1 adorable fast simple the best part just two ends to weave in i made dozens of these every year for my soccer players when i coached and i needed a quick way to make little sweaters - figuring out a way to finish the sleeves as i was separating them saved so much work this tiny pullover uses fingering or sport weight yarn less than 3g and 5g respectively instructions are written for dpns but it is easy to adapt for magic loop or 2 circs sizes fingering 2 25 / 5cm tall 1 5 / 4cm wide at body sport 2 75 / 7cm tall 2 / 5 5cm wide at body 1 https //www imaginedlandscapes com/signup/
